docs.title: Dependencies
docs.text: We are using uv to manage our python dependencies in this project. To get started with uv, following their setup guide.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.text: We are using mkdocs to build the documentation site.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Idox
docs.text:
Idox make the planning portal for software uses by most local planning authorities in the UK.
